DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate clinical performance survival rate NobelProceraTM Bridge Shaded Zirconia natural teeth posterior region period 5 year . The work hypothesis clinical study industrial centrally produce 3- 4-unit bridge shade yttrium-oxide partially-stabilized ( Y-TZP ) zirconia ( NobelProceraTM Shaded Zirconia ) combination veneer ceramic material show sufficient CDA rating ( 80 % R+S ) sufficient survival rate ( 93 % ) 5 year comparison reference level 95 % .
DOC.criteria: The subject must least 18 ( age consent ) , less 70 time inclusion . The subject healthy compliant good oral hygiene The subject need posterior fix partial denture restoration 4 unit distal canine maxilla mandible . The subject shall stable occlusal relationship fully restore , fix oppose dentition . Obtained informed consent subject subject available 5year term investigation . No apical disorder inflammation abutment teeth , adjacent oppose teeth . Good gingival / periodontal / periapical status restoring , oppose adjacent teeth . Healed situation soft tissue augmentation allow . The subject available 5year term investigation . The subject able give her/his inform consent participate . Alcohol drug abuse note patient record patient history . Reason believe treatment might negative effect patient 's total situation ( psychiatric problem ) , note patient record patient history . An exist condition acceptable retention restoration impossible attain Mobility tooth restore . Pathologic pocket formation 4 mm great around tooth restore Severe bruxism destructive habit Amount attach soft tissue insufficient ( attach gingiva buccal side tooth ) . Health condition , permit restorative procedure
